Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring the disclosure of fees on certain internet websites and mobile applications
Summary: Requires the disclosure of fees on internet websites and mobile applications which allow consumers to acquire loans with terms of less than one month.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ss, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring the disclosure of fees on certain internet websites and mobile applications
